index.2: 基于 Vue 3，面向开发者的 CesiumJS 组件库。
index.4: 了解设计指南，帮助开发人员搭建逻辑清晰、结构合理且高效易用的应用。
index.7: 使用 Demo 快速体验三维场景；使用前端框架封装的代码帮助工程师快速开发。
index.9: 下载相关资源，用其快速搭建页面原型或高保真视觉稿，提升产品设计效率。
index.10: 已加入 Cesium 认证开发者计划

design.12: 与加载的 Cesium 库的 API 一致；
design.14: 遵循 Vue 风格指南。
design.22: 采用 Vue 组合式 API 开发，代码可读性高；
design.24: MVVM 数据驱动 + 组件复用，极大简化代码量。
design.29: Vue for Cesium 采用 MIT 开源协议；
design.31: 用户可根据需求加载原生 Cesium 库、自己修改的 Cesium 库以及第三方扩展的 Cesium 库均可。

resource.placeholder2: 资源正在整理和完善中...

index.2: A Vue3 based component library of CesiumJS for developers.
index.4: Understand the design guidelines, helping designers build product that's logically sound, reasonably structured and easy to use.
index.7: Experience the 3D scene by strolling through component demos. Use encapsulated code to improve developing efficiency.
index.9: Download relevant design resources for shaping page prototype or visual draft, increasing design efficiency.
index.10: Joined the Cesium Certified Developer Program

design.12: Consistent with the API of the loaded Cesium library.
design.22: Developed with Vue Composition API, high readability.
design.24: MVVM data drive + component reuse, greatly simplifying the amount of code.
design.26: the interface should be straightforward, which helps the users to identify and frees them from memorizing and recalling.
design.29: MIT open source agreement, the related technology cited will also indicate the source.
design.31: users can load native Cesium, self-modified Cesium, and third-party extended Cesium according to their needs.
